content.description: A slightly dirty high ball boulder problem on the Feather River. A fall from up high would not be a fun one. Crux is a scary hand heal match by your head and a big reach to the sloppy lip. Easy up to this point and that's where the fun begins. There is a two bolt anchor in which you can top rope the problem first before fully committing. Highly recommended that you work it on TR before going for the send
content.protection: Enough pads to make you feel better and a two bolted anchor to practice.
content.location: You will park in the turn out and head towards the river. There is a small path where you can walk down and you will see the problem on the far right side of the boulder. The start is on the obvious crimps about waits high when stating on the boulder and above your head from where you would land if you fall.
